title: Add food photos to catalog cards

requirements.summary: Display food photos on catalog cards above the food name when imageUrl is available
acceptanceCriteria: Food photo is displayed prominently on each card when available
Photo has proper aspect ratio and responsive sizing
Fallback UI is shown if imageUrl is not provided
Photo styling integrates seamlessly with the existing card design

file_operations.description: Add an img element above the food name to display the food photo when imageUrl is provided. Use the imageUrl from the FoodItem prop to render the image with appropriate styling that matches the warm earth tone design (rounded corners, proper spacing, responsive sizing with aspect-ratio handling). Include a fallback UI (gradient background or placeholder) when imageUrl is not available. Ensure the photo integrates seamlessly with the existing card layout including the category icon, badges, and description.

requirements.summary: Add optional image URL input field to the recipe upload form
acceptanceCriteria: Image URL input field is added to the form
Field is clearly labeled and optional
Form submission includes imageUrl value when provided

file_operations.description: Add an optional imageUrl text input field to the form after the name field and before the country dropdown. Label it clearly as 'Image URL (optional)' with placeholder text suggesting the expected format. Update the form state to include the imageUrl field and ensure it is passed to the addFoodItemMutation when the form is submitted. The field should accept text input and be styled consistently with the existing form inputs using the warm earth tone palette.

requirements.summary: Wire generated food photos as static frontend assets and reference them correctly in FoodCard
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are properly referenced in FoodCard
Images load correctly from the static assets directory
No backend routing is used for serving generated images

file_operations.description: Ensure the img element added in REQ-12 references the imageUrl prop directly using src={item.imageUrl}. The generated image files will be located at frontend/public/assets/generated/churros.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/mochi-ice-cream.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/timbits.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/pastel-de-nata.dim_400x300.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/bubble-tea.dim_400x300.png. These paths should be stored in the backend as /assets/generated/[filename] format and will be served as static assets by the frontend build system.
